Description: Fragment of the body of a black figure Clazomenian painted pottery broad amphora. Woman dancer (the thin line in front of her is the frame of the panel). Purple for border of skirt. White for flesh, for dots on each side of border of skirt, for four-dot rosettes on skirt.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 590, 11)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 159)
